roleset.name: not the same as, unbalanced
roleset.note: UNEQUAL-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7, relation to 'equal.01'. (from unequal.01-j)

role.descr: attribute, quality in which 2 things are not equal

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: Equality is for some parts of the population to hear , if it 's equal to some then of course it 's unequal to the other .
